caption.p: Tree species inhabited by arboreal tiger beetles in Lanao del Sur Province, Mindanao Philippines: (a) * Spathodea campanulata, (b) Hibiscus tiliaceus, (c) Erythrina fusca, (d) * Mangifera indica, (e) * Acacia mangium (phot. J. S. Marohomsalic). Alien/invasive species were marked with asterisk (*)
